name: Nagios-plugin-couchbase
tagline: A Nagios plugin to check the status of Couchbase 2.0
body:
## Nagios CouchBase Plugin for monitoring CouchBase

### Installation
 sudo python setup.py install

### Usage 
You can see how to use plugin from [readme file](https://github.com/YakindanEgitim/nagios-plugin-couchbase/blob/master/README.md) of project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
